cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_address to invalid IP '192.168.70.256' (octet 256 > 255) will cause interface binding failure and F1 connection error.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssPBCH_BlockPower to 100 (exceeds valid dBm range) will cause SSB transmission power error and cell broadcast failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssPBCH_BlockPower 設定為 100（超過有效 dBm 範圍）會導致 SSB 傳輸功率錯誤並造成小區廣播失敗。
